com.threerings.toybox.server
Class ToyBoxConfig

java.lang.Object
  com.threerings.toybox.server.ToyBoxConfig

public class ToyBoxConfig
extends Object

Provides access to installation specific configuration parameters. Once the ToyBoxManager has been created, the ToyBoxConfig is initialized and becomes available for use.
